common.title: EaseQR
common.description: Easily convert various information like URLs, contacts, WiFi, and more into QR codes.
common.subtitle: Create your own QR codes with logo insertion and color customization.

generator.title: QR Code Generator
generator.description: Convert URLs, contacts, WiFi, and more into QR codes

help.url: Scan the QR code to go directly to this URL.
help.contact: Scan the QR code to automatically save this contact.
help.wifi: Scan the QR code to automatically connect to this WiFi.
help.email: Scan the QR code to open the email composition screen.
help.sms: Scan the QR code to open the SMS composition screen.
help.text: Scan the QR code to display the text you entered.

preview.empty: Enter data to display the QR code here
preview.emptyPreview: Enter data to display the preview
preview.enterDataFirst: Enter data in the Generate tab first

errors.fileTypeDesc: Only image files (.jpg, .png, .gif, etc.) are supported.
errors.urlRequiredDesc: Enter a URL to generate a QR code
errors.lowContrast: QR code color contrast is too low
errors.lowContrastDesc: The QR code may not be scannable. Please adjust the colors.
errors.downloadFailedDesc: An error occurred while generating the QR code
errors.shareFailedDesc: No clipboard access permission or an error occurred

success.logoUploadedDesc: Logo has been applied to the QR code.
success.logoRemovedDesc: Logo has been removed from the QR code.
success.settingsResetDesc: QR code settings have been reset to defaults

warnings.lowContrast: Warning: Low QR color contrast may be difficult to recognize on some scanners.
warnings.veryLowContrast: Critical: QR color contrast is too low, scanning may be impossible!

history.title: QR Code History
history.loadDesc: Applied selected QR code to the editor
history.copyFailDesc: No clipboard access or an error occurred

about.title: About QR Codes
about.content: A QR code (Quick Response code) is a two-dimensional matrix barcode that can store information. It was developed by Denso Wave in Japan in 1994 and is now used in various fields. It can store various data such as URLs, contact information, and WiFi details.
about.appDescription: EaseQR is a simple tool for converting URLs into QR codes. Generated QR codes can be scanned with a smartphone camera to access websites directly, making them useful for business cards, posters, product packaging, and more.

qr.title: QR Code Generator
qr.description: Convert URLs, contacts, WiFi, and more into QR codes.

warnings.contrastLow: Warning: Low QR color contrast may be difficult to scan with some readers.
warnings.contrastVeryLow: Critical: QR color contrast is too low and may not be scannable!
warnings.imageOnly: Only image files (.jpg, .png, .gif etc.) can be uploaded.
warnings.logoUploadDesc: Logo has been applied to the QR code.
warnings.logoRemoveDesc: Logo has been removed from the QR code.
warnings.resetDesc: QR code settings have been reset to default values
